WaistCat.name: Cat Stretch
WaistCat.preparation: Kneel on mat or floor. Place hands shoulder width apart.
WaistCat.execution: Flex spine by hunching back up. Hold stretch.

WaistCatMovement.name: Cat Movement
WaistCatMovement.preparation: Kneel on mat or floor. Place hands shoulder width apart.
WaistCatMovement.execution: Flex spine by hunching back up. Extend spine by arching back. Repeat.

WaistBentoverCat.name: Bent-over Cat Stretch
WaistBentoverCat.preparation: Bend over with hands just above bent knees.
WaistBentoverCat.execution: Flex spine by hunching back up. Hold stretch.

WaistPCLowBack.name: Lever Lower Back Stretch
WaistPCLowBack.preparation: Sit on seat in forward position with lower legs on shin pad, feet on foot rest. Place hands through wrist straps. Hold upper bar with overhand grip.
WaistPCLowBack.execution: Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch.

WaistLying.name: Lying Lower Back Stretch
WaistLying.preparation: Lie supine on floor or mat. Raise both knees and grasp back of thighs behind knees.
WaistLying.execution: Pull knees toward shoulders allowing hips to be raised further off floor. Hold stretch.
WaistLying.comments: Upper back can also be lifted off of floor to stretch Splenius and cervical portion of Erector Spinae.

WaistSeatedFloor.name: Seated Lower Back Stretch
WaistSeatedFloor.preparation: Sit on floor or mat with feet apart and knees bent approximately 90 degrees.
WaistSeatedFloor.execution: Reach forward between feet. Hold stretch.
WaistSeatedFloor.comments: Elbows can be lowered to floor.

WaistSeatedBentover.name: Seated Bent-over Lower Back Stretch
WaistSeatedBentover.preparation: Sit on chair or bench with feet wide apart. Bend over and position shoulders between knees.
WaistSeatedBentover.execution: Reach to floor under back of chair. Hold stretch.

WaistSquatting.name: Squatting Lower Back Stretch
WaistSquatting.preparation: Stand facing hip height fixed bar approximately arm length away. Grasp fixed bar.
WaistSquatting.execution: Keeping feet flat on floor, squat down as low as possible and bend down with arms straight. Lean back slightly and allow shoulders to stretch forward. Hold stretch.
WaistSquatting.comments: Keep knees pointed same direction as toes. The Soleus may be slightly stretched before leaning back.

WaistPlow.name: Plow Stretch
WaistPlow.preparation: Lie on back and lift legs and hip overhead.
WaistPlow.execution: Allow knees to drop toward floor to sides of head. Hold stretch.
